TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WorkbookEvents_SheetSelectionChangeEventHandler(object Sh, Range Target);
.class public auto ansi sealed WorkbookEvents_SheetSelectionChangeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WorkbookEvents_SheetSelectionChangeEventHandler(Sh As Object, Target As Range)
public delegate void WorkbookEvents_SheetSelectionChangeEventHandler(System::Object ^ Sh, Range ^ Target);

param.name: Sh
param.span: Hoja de cálculo que contiene la nueva selección.

span.span: The worksheet that contains the new selection.

summary.span: Tipo de delegado que se usa para agregar un controlador de eventos para el evento.

span.span: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event.

summary.span: El evento SheetSelectionChange se produce cuando cambia la selección en cualquier hoja de cálculo (no se produce si la selección está en una hoja de gráficos).

span.span: The SheetSelectionChange event occurs when the selection changes on any worksheet (doesn't occur if the selection is on a chart sheet).
